title.narrative: Wellbeing by Green and Smart Energy

description.narrative: The aim of the project is to develop rapidly scalable business model and technology that decreases consumer price of energy increases electricity availability and makes energy system less depending on fossil fuels.Technical commercial and social requiremen ts and opportunities will be analysed in project feasibility study.Business plan will be done together with local specialist based on the feasibility study results. The business plan will be used also for scaling the business later on.The contact with our local partner Star Group for optimizing the energy efficiency and sales of green energy will be done when the business plan is ready.The pilot project includes delivery of 70kW solar power plant 70kVA Dynamic Power System that monitors and controls energy efficiency and inverts solar power and more than 100kWh Lithium-Ion energy storage capacity. Especial Blockchain based control and invoicing system will be developed and several power meters will be installed for monitoring and sales of energy. Cleaner Fut ure Oy and Nordic ST Engineering and Consulting Oy will establish a daughter company in Somaliland to operate the pilot plant. The operation of the daughter company will be expanded based on the pilot project experiences.The piloting verifies our way of co upling different technologies taking into account especial conditionsn and needs in the target country. The technology and business model is rapidly scalable in other African countries as well. Local staff will be trained to build install and operate the p ilot system. Trained personnel will be hired to expand the operations when scaling the business. The project leads to increased economic activity improves the local living conditions and decreases dependency from fossil fuels.
